text: Source Code is a 2011 American science fiction-thriller movie that was produced by Mark Gordon, Jordan Wynn and Philippe Rousselet and was directed by Duncan Jones. Source Code was released on April 1, 2011 in North America. The movie gained very positive reviews with a 90% from Rotten Tomatoes and a 74 out of 100 from Metacritic. == Cast == *Jake Gyllenhaal as Colter Stevens *Michelle Monaghan as Christina *Vera Farmiga as Carol Goodwin *Jeffrey Wright as Dr. Rutledge *Cas Anvar as Hazmi *Russell Peters as Max Denoff *Michael Arden as Derek Frost == Other websites == *Source Code's official website * * Category:2011 science fiction movies Category:2011 thriller movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies shot in Chicago Category:Time travel movies
title: Source Code
